title: House of Cards: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's David Haglund and June Thomas discuss the entire first season of Netflix's original series House of Cards. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the show.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
